dcterms:description: Pendulum-Angle is an environment adapted from Pendulum, a classic control environment whose goal is to swing up a bar and let it stay upright. The goal is modified into swinging up to a given angle, sampled randomly from a reward sampler.
dcterms:title: Pendulum-Angle

dcterms:creator: A. Barreto
D. Borsa
J. Quan
T. Schaul
D. Silver
M. Hessel
D. Mankowitz
A. Zidek
R. Munos
dcterms:description: HalfCheetah-Vel is adapted from a standard meta reinforcement learning baseline where the goal is to achieve a target velocity running forward. The reward function is designed to minimize the difference between the current and target velocities.
dcterms:title: HalfCheetah-Vel

dcterms:creator: A. Barreto
S. Hou
D. Borsa
D. Silver
D. Precup
dcterms:description: Ant-Dir is adapted from a standard meta reinforcement learning baseline where the goal is to keep a 2D-Ant moving in a given direction. The reward function is designed to encourage movement in the specified direction while penalizing excessive actions.
dcterms:title: Ant-Dir
